item.title: Israel receives body Hamas says belongs to Gaza hostage
item.description: The remains of 15 hostages who died on or after the 7 October attacks have so far been returned to Israel.

item.title: Key figures at odds over collapse of China spy case
item.description: A parliamentary committee hears evidence about why the case against two men accused for spying for China was dropped.

item.title: City trader sues UBS for $400m after rate-rigging conviction quashed
item.description: Tom Hayes launches a legal claim against UBS, claiming he was the bank's "hand-picked scapegoat".

item.title: How Was The Migrant Sex Offender Mistakenly Released?
item.description: Justice Secretary says human error led to migrant sex offender release.

item.title: UK signs Â£8bn Typhoon fighter jet deal with Turkey
item.description: The agreement will support thousands of jobs across the UK, the government says.
